mapper.select: SELECT c.id as semiId , c.topic_big as topicBig , c.topic_small as topicSmall , c.title , c.location , c.edate , c.ddate , c.target , IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT a.cust_id), 0) as targetIn , IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT l.like_id), 0) as likesCount , c.image_main as imageMain , c.image_sub as imageSub , c.comment , c.content , c.reword_coin as rewardCoin , c.view , c.rdate FROM contents c LEFT JOIN apply a ON c.id = a.contents_id LEFT JOIN likes l ON c.id = l.contents_id WHERE c.id=#{semiId}

SELECT id as semiId , topic_big as topicBig , topic_small as topicSmall , title , location , edate , ddate , target , target_in as targetIn , image_main as imageMain , image_sub as imageSub , comment , content , reword_coin as rewardCoin , view , rdate FROM contents WHERE topic_big = 'S' ORDER BY semiId DESC

SELECT id AS semiId, title, image_main AS imageMain, comment, content FROM liivtogether.contents WHERE topic_big = 'S' AND edate >= CURDATE() -- 오늘보다 크거나 같은 날짜 AND (target_in < target) -- 인원이 차지 않은 경우만 포함 ORDER BY edate ASC LIMIT 3;

SELECT c.id as semiId , c.topic_big as topicBig , c.topic_small as topicSmall , c.title , c.edate , c.ddate , c.target , IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT a.cust_id), 0) as targetIn , IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT l.like_id), 0) as likesCount , c.image_main as imageMain , c.reword_coin as rewardCoin , c.view , c.rdate FROM contents c LEFT JOIN apply a ON c.id = a.contents_id LEFT JOIN likes l ON c.id = l.contents_id WHERE c.topic_big = 'S'
AND c.topic_small = #{topicSmall}
AND (c.edate >= #{currentDate} OR c.edate IS NULL)
GROUP BY c.id, c.topic_big, c.topic_small, c.title, c.edate, c.ddate, c.target, c.image_main, c.reword_coin, c.view, c.rdate
ORDER BY semiId DESC
ORDER BY likesCount DESC
ORDER BY c.edate ASC
ORDER BY targetIn DESC
ORDER BY c.view DESC
LIMIT 9
OFFSET #{offset}
